You are here: SALESFORCE HELP DOCS SERVICE CLOUD Insert and Use Quick Text

Use quick text to insert predefined messages on any standard or custom objects in Knowledge articles, Chats, Log a Call actions, emails, events, tasks, and social posts.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in Salesforce Classic in: Group, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
Available in Lightning Experience in: Essentials, Professional, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions

USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To insert quick text: Read on quick text

Each quick text message is associated with one or more communication channels. Select the field where you want to insert a quick text message.

Supported fields:
Email - Email Message (used in Email actions) - HTML Body, Text Body
Event - Event - Description
Internal - Internal fields
Knowledge - Knowledge (used in Lightning Knowledge articles) - Fields with data type Rich Text Area
Chat - Live Chat Transcript (used in chats) - Body, Supervisor Transcript Body
Phone - Task (used in Log a Call actions) - Comments
Portal - Experience Cloud sites or customer portals
Social - Social Post - Message
Task - Task - Comments

Launch the quick text browser by clicking the quick text button in the toolbar. Find the message you want to insert and select it. Modify the text if needed before sending or saving.

SEE ALSO
Create Quick Text Messages
title: Insert and Use Quick Text in Service Cloud
